backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing newsletters, translations, and PDF blobs with CRUD-style methods and language utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking UI translation and language-picker requirements to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for key frontend files including components, context, hooks, and translations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query and language context, rendering Header, NewsletterGrid, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying BrAIn Project copyright without AI attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, translated title, and a language dropdown limited to English and Turkish.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterCard.t: Newsletter card showing translated info and selecting English/Turkish PDFs for Newsletter 1.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterGrid.t: Grid rendering placeholder newsletters with translations and skeletons during loading.
frontend/src/components/PDFViewer.tsx: React PDF viewer with zoom, fullscreen, pagination, and PDF.js-based page count loading.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for managing and accessing the current UI language.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication logic, storing identities and exposing login state via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch newsletters and translations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines static translation strings for multiple languages keyed by TranslationKey values.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling theming, plugins, and extended color and animation settings.
